Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Stetson/Randolph
ShortDescription: NB  #6 Jackson Park Exp buses are rrtd via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus, Wacker, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near Stetson/Randolph.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound  #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus, Wacker, then resume their normal route (take layover on Wacker between Columbus and Michigan) due to street blockage near Stetson/Randolph.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #X9 Ashland Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Beverly/97th
ShortDescription: Southbound X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 95th, Vincennes, 103rd and Vincennes: due to, street blockage near Beverly/79th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 95th, Vincennes, 103rd and Vincennes: due to, street blockage near Beverly/79th.

Northbound uses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Eastbound Reroute near irving Park/Key Stone
ShortDescription: EB 80 Irving Park buses are temp. rerouted via Irving Park, Avondale,  Pulaski and Irving Park: due to, street blockage near Irving Park/Key Stone.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Avondale, Pulaski and Irving Park: due to, street blockage near Irving Park/Key Stone.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at 95th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at 95th

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
